org.gjt.sp.jedit.help
クラス HelpViewer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      org.gjt.sp.jedit.help.HelpViewer
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants, EBComponent, HelpHistoryModelListener, HelpViewerInterface
public class HelpViewer
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements HelpViewerInterface, EBComponent, HelpHistoryModelListener

jEdit's searchable help viewer. It uses a Swing JEditorPane to display the HTML, and implements a URL history.

バージョン:
$Id: HelpViewer.java 23463 2014-04-07 19:33:50Z kerik-sf $
作成者:
Slava Pestov
関連項目:
直列化された形式

gotoURL

public void gotoURL(java.lang.String url,
                    boolean addToHistory,
                    int scrollPosition)
Displays the specified URL in the HTML component.

定義:
インタフェース HelpViewerInterface 内の gotoURL
パラメータ:
url - The URL
addToHistory - Should the URL be added to the back/forward history?
scrollPosition - The vertical scrollPosition

インタフェース HelpViewerInterface の記述:
Called when the helpviewer is closed

定義:
インタフェース HelpViewerInterface 内の dispose
オーバーライド:
クラス java.awt.Window 内の dispose

handleMessage

public void handleMessage(EBMessage msg)
インタフェース EBComponent の記述:
Handles a message sent on the EditBus. This method must specify the type of responses the plugin will have for various subclasses of the EBMessage class. Typically this is done with one or more if blocks that test whether the message is an instance of a derived message class in which the component has an interest. For example: 
 if(msg instanceof BufferUpdate) {
     // a buffer's state has changed!
 }
 else if(msg instanceof ViewUpdate) {
     // a view's state has changed!
 }
 // ... and so on

定義:
インタフェース EBComponent 内の handleMessage
パラメータ:
msg - The message
